org.apache.giraph.partition

类 PartitionBalancer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.PartitionBalancer

  • public class PartitionBalancer
extends Object
    Helper class for balancing partitions across a set of workers.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String EGDE_BALANCE_ALGORITHM
      Rebalance across supersteps by edges
      static String PARTITION_BALANCE_ALGORITHM
      Partition balancing algorithm
      static String STATIC_BALANCE_ALGORITHM
      No rebalancing during the supersteps
      static String VERTICES_BALANCE_ALGORITHM
      Rebalance across supersteps by vertices

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Collection<PartitionOwner> balancePartitionsAcrossWorkers(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, Collection<PartitionOwner> partitionOwners, Collection<PartitionStats> allPartitionStats, Collection<WorkerInfo> availableWorkerInfos)
      Balance the partitions with an algorithm based on a value.
      static PartitionExchange updatePartitionOwners(List<PartitionOwner> partitionOwnerList, WorkerInfo myWorkerInfo, Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> masterSetPartitionOwners, PartitionStore partitionStore)
      Helper function to update partition owners and determine which partitions need to be sent from a specific worker.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • PARTITION_BALANCE_ALGORITHM

        public static final String PARTITION_BALANCE_ALGORITHM
        Partition balancing algorithm
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • balancePartitionsAcrossWorkers

        public static Collection<PartitionOwner> balancePartitionsAcrossWorkers(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                        Collection<PartitionOwner> partitionOwners,
                                                        Collection<PartitionStats> allPartitionStats,
                                                        Collection<WorkerInfo> availableWorkerInfos)
        Balance the partitions with an algorithm based on a value.
        参数:
        conf - Configuration to find the algorithm
        partitionOwners - All the owners of all partitions
        allPartitionStats - All the partition stats
        availableWorkerInfos - All the available workers
        返回:
        Balanced partition owners

      • updatePartitionOwners

        public static PartitionExchange updatePartitionOwners(List<PartitionOwner> partitionOwnerList,
                                      WorkerInfo myWorkerInfo,
                                      Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> masterSetPartitionOwners,
                                      PartitionStore partitionStore)
        Helper function to update partition owners and determine which partitions need to be sent from a specific worker.
        参数:
        partitionOwnerList - Local PartitionOwner list for the given worker
        myWorkerInfo - Worker info
        masterSetPartitionOwners - Master set partition owners, received prior to beginning the superstep
        partitionStore - Partition store for the given worker
        返回:
        Information for the partition exchange.
